last_episode_to_air.name: The Night Shift
last_episode_to_air.overview: With support from her confidant, Pernille prepares for an intense work shift to confirm her suspicions. But the night takes an unexpected turn.

name: The Nurse
overview: Pernille Kurzmann Larsen, a fresh-faced nurse at a hospital, begins to question the attention-seeking tendencies of her colleague, Christina Aistrup Hansen. As Pernille delves deeper into her suspicions, she starts to believe that Christina's behavior may be linked to a series of patient deaths.

episodes.name: I Will Survive
episodes.overview: Nervous about her first shift as a nurse at a new hospital, Pernille quickly befriends her assigned mentor, the charismatic Christina.

episodes.name: Dream Team
episodes.overview: A colleague's warning causes Pernille to reassess her friendship with Christina, even as they are dubbed "the dream team" after saving a patient's life.

episodes.name: So Take My Heart
episodes.overview: Dismissed as a scandalmonger when attempting to alert her superiors, Pernille reaches out to a former employee to voice her unease.

episodes.name: The Night Shift
episodes.overview: With support from her confidant, Pernille prepares for an intense work shift to confirm her suspicions. But the night takes an unexpected turn.
